My first post.

I like the penguins

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```
glimpse(penguins)
```

```{r}
library(here)
dat <- read_csv(here("data", "2012-18_playerBoxScore.csv"))
```

```{r}
glimpse(dat)
```

```{r}
ggplot(dat, aes(x = playPos, y = `play3P%`)) +
geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
## try and load tidytuesday data
aus_temp <- read_csv(here::here("data", "tidytuesday", "data", "2020", "2020-01-07", "temperature.csv"))
```

```{r}
aus_temp %>%
    filter(city_name == "PERTH", date >= "2000-01-01") %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = date, y = temperature, color = temp_type)) +
    geom_line()
```
